content: Follow the path from the Snake Trail Keeper's Shrine and make your way down to the large, flat, open area filled with bamboo and skeleton enemies. At the edge of this area is a small gap in the rock wall that you can pass through. Guangmou will be waiting for you inside.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangmou_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Guangmou Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Guangmou Location'.
The content is as follows:
Follow the path from the Snake Trail Keeper's Shrine and make your way down to the large, flat, open area filled with bamboo and skeleton enemies. At the edge of this area is a small gap in the rock wall that you can pass through. Guangmou will be waiting for you inside.
